This game sucks absolute butt. I've played for almost 700 hours and can confidently say that you should just play League of Legends (which is free) if you want to go out of your way to ruin your own day. Playing survivor means you'll get focused out of the match by killers with less than 3 brain cells 90% of the time. And trust me... that's no fun at all. Even if you choose to leave a match early b/c the killer is tunneling you and you're not having a good time, you'll receive a matchmaking ban that's longer than it should be. Whatever you do after reading this, make sure not to purchase this garbage tier game!

If you love co-op or horror or both, I highly recommend checking out Dead by Daylight. It offers a refreshing take on so many different game mechanics. This title really does bring something unique to the table. Dead by Daylight is as entertaining and exciting as a good horror movie. However, the multiplayer shocker lacks variety.

Dieses Spiel ist einfach nur WOOOW!
Ich verfolge es schon seit Jahren bei einigen YouTubern und habe mich vor ca. einem halben Jahr auch dazu entschlossen es zu kaufen und ehrlich: Es ist jeden Cent wert!
Auch wenn die Handlung recht simple aufgebaut ist (5 Generatoren reparieren und dabei möglichst nicht sterben) werden durch die vielen neuen Updates immer wieder neue Killer und Überlebende hinzugefügt mit neuen Perks oder sogar neuen Spielmaps, die das Spiel am Leben halten.
Natürlich hat das Spiel noch Fehler, aber welches Spiel ist schon perfekt?
Ich bin einfach nur begeistert und freue mich auf das was in der Zukunft noch so an Neuerungen aufkreuzen wird!
Wir sehen uns im Spiel wieder. ;D
DBD is one of the BEST GAMES I have ever played. 10/10 minus the bad lag

Un juego con una de las peores comunidades que pueden tener. Como superviviente te vas a encontrar a un montón de asesinos camperos y focuseros, con lo que cuando te atrapen, di adiós a tu partida, haciendo aburrida. Además, la inmensa mayoría de supervivientes son malísimos, y no duran ni 30 segundos en persecución al asesino, con lo que tus posibilidades de escapar son pocas si te toca un equipo malo.

Como asesino te vas a encontrar a un montón de supervivientes que solo saben esconderse, con lo que vas a un motor y no hay nadie y te tiras varios minutos para encontrar a alguien. Además, están los jugadores que solo se dedican a reparar sin quere que les persiga el asesino y van a estar escondiendose todo el rato, por no hablar de que muchos hacen t-bag para burlarse detrás de un pallet o en la salida haciendo todo el rato burlas alargado la partida innecesariamente.

Un juego con unas mecánicas que podrían ser interesantes  pero son muy aburridas debido a la comunidad toxica que tiene, y lo vuelvo a repetir, de las peores que pueden existir en un juego.
top pra caralho me divirto mt

Sobreviva junto a aliados contra um assassino com sede de sangue, conserte geradores, para abrir a saída principal, e se as coisas esquentarem, e infelizmente TODOS os seus aliados forem mortos, escape sozinho por um alsapao escondido em alguma parte do mapa!

El juego cada actualización nerfea a los asesinos, simpre generando ventaja para los supervivientes... (2019)
Dos años despues el juego sigue igual con respecto al 2019, al punto de que al jugar con el rol de superviviente, la busqueda de partida se demora 5 - 10 mins aproximadamente, mientras que de asesino el encontrar partida es de inmediato. Esto se da porque nadie quiere jugar como asesino mientras haya "premades"

It game

INCREDIBLY BAD GAME. DO NOT GIVE THESE CARELESS DEVELOPERS ANYMORE OF YOUR MONEY. YOU'RE BETTER OFF BUYING HITMAN OR ROCKET LEAGUE, OR LITERALLY ANY GAME THAT ISN'T THIS. This game used to have potential. I can honestly say this game is one of the worst things I've ever played. Not due to content or bugs, but from the lack of care the Behaviour Devs have with so many fans and customers. The entire game is incredibly buggy, it's apparently been like that for months, and the devs are FAR TOO BUSY creating DLC for the game instead of, ya know, fixing this steaming pile of horse manure. Everything about this game is frustrating, from the controls to the killers to the survivors to the actual community playing the game to the developers. There's an air of, "screw you pleb," pervading every facet of this game. The load times are awful, there are very few even balanced killers (with them either being completely OP or laughable in how awful their design and functions are), and while a few maps are enjoyable, there are far more badly programmed maps. Example being: "The Game" or that stupid meat packing plant. You may as well have burned whatever useful item or tool you had in your loadout because you are dying if you are a survivor, and that super rare useful item you WERE going to use is now gone before you had a chance to even apply your medkit or use your toolbox. And my biggest problem is still the devs. They truly do not care about their customers. Do not buy this game, and do not keep giving these devs more money than they deserve. This game is the equivalent of paying 20 dollars to get kicked in the nuts over and over again. Overall, this whole game is a MASSIVE PILE OF WASTED POTENTIAL, that is made basically unplayable. I understand challenging games. There's a difference between challenging and not fun, and that's what this game is after the first 3 plays. Just not fun.

Has a decent sized community and looks to for a while still. 
The developers always seem to be trying to improve the game and take on community feedback to some extent. 
Both sides offer different experiences and also are fun to play.  
It's a lot of fun to play survivors with friends but also still enjoyable to play survivor solo.
